projects.title: Turbine for Loop Line Follower
projects.bodyText:
- For a different type of competition that required a turbine to do a 360 degrees spin while following a line.
 - Design a platform that allows me to place 2 suction/grip turbines at the bottom of the car 
 - Despite the fact that I had to improvise for the car turbine design, there are huge take aways after car burn during competition: such that there were more suitable electronics and mechanical aspect (10:1 for the engines) to be implemented 
 - Connected the  DC engines to with a 30A ESC and controlled the power using an arduino nano 
 -Competed in Guadalajara, Mexico in the event 'Talent Land'
 - April 1st, 2018

projects.title: Loop Line Follower
projects.bodyText:
- Loop line follower is an old and traditional robotics competition. 
 - Started from building a PCB model in Eagle, then added the main components:IR, Encoder, Microcontroller (which in my case I used Arduino, to keep the coding aspect at a high level), 10:1/6V pololu motors, and a TB1266FNG driver 
 - Next step was to develop a basic PID model 
 - Finally, Calibration of the PID was the most time consuming part as well as as the acceleration control using the magnetic encoders 
 - Competed and developed the robot in Valparaiso, Chile
 - October 11th, 2017

projects.title: Windows Voice over
projects.bodyText:
- A voice over interface for Windows OS.
 - Will help people do task like opening google chrome to access system information 
 - Has been developed with an emphazis for people with physiscal disabilities because of the need of having a user friendly voice over control. It has also been use in Multi-Tasking.
 - Developed a friendly User Interface 
 - Year 2017

projects.title: Quiet Hours App
projects.bodyText:
- An Android App that **automatically silences** your phone during class hours, designed for **VITians**.
 - Option to select class **slots** and **custom time**.
 - Option to put on Vibrate instead of Silent.

projects.title: Secure Chat App
projects.bodyText:
- An Android App that allows users to send texts in real time.
 - End to End encryption using **RSA** Algorithm.
 - Uses **Firebase** database to store texts.
 - Secured with **Fingerprint** lock.

projects.title: MVVM Sample App
projects.bodyText:
- An Android App that loads data from mock API and show in both **LinearLayout** and **GridLayout RecyclerView**.
 - Offline support using **Room** DB and **NetworkBoundResource**.
 - Uses the **MVVM** architecture.

projects.title: Feed List App
projects.bodyText:
- An Android App that loads list of feeds from a **paginated** API and shows in a RecyclerView.
 - Uses the **MVVM** architecture.
 - Uses **Paging 3** library along with other Architecture Components.

projects.title: Task Tracker
projects.bodyText:
- A simple Task Tracker web app made with **Angular 12**.
 - Uses **mock JSON server** to get, add, delete or update tasks.

projects.title: Image Encryption/Decryption
projects.bodyText:
- A Web App for Image Encryption and Decryption made in **Django**.
 - Uses **SDES** algorithm for encryption/decryption.
